column2:
"Got another request for you. About those \"Darkers\" we fought before...
I want to focus on exterminating them for a while."
"Their smell reminds me of something from Ragol. A dangerous thing that mutates creatures. Should be fun... Heheheh."

"Did you say Darkers? I want in. Those things can travel through space...
What if they can get to planets in other dimensions like Earth?"
"Examining Darker biology might put me closer to completing my inter-dimensional transfer device. Please, take me with you!"

"I should say no...
You'll have to take care of yourself, got that? If you slow us down, we'll leave you behind."
